column1: Table 7-8:  CH4 and N2O Emissions from Domestic and Industrial Wastewater Treatment (kt)

a Industrial activity for CH4 includes the pulp and paper manufacturing, meat and poultry processing, fruit and vegetable processing, starch-based ethanol production, petroleum refining, and breweries industries.
b Industrial activity for N2O includes the pulp and paper manufacturing, meat and poultry processing, starch-based ethanol production, and petroleum refining.
Note: Totals may not sum due to independent rounding.
